thread.title: SEGA Releases Exciting Details About Super Monkey Ball Banana Clash Adventure Mode for Nintendo Switch Game Set to Launch on June 25, 2024 - World Today News
thread.title_full: SEGA Releases Exciting Details About Super Monkey Ball Banana Clash Adventure Mode for Nintendo Switch Game Set to Launch on June 25, 2024 - World Today News

author: world today news
title: SEGA Releases Exciting Details About Super Monkey Ball Banana Clash Adventure Mode for Nintendo Switch Game Set to Launch on June 25, 2024 - World Today News
text:
SEGA has released a promotional video introducing the latest adventure mode of the Nintendo Switch game “Super Monkey Ball Banana Clash”, and also provided detailed information on the level content. This game is expected to be released on June 25, 2024 (Tuesday).
This game has a new “Battle Mode”, where players can engage in online multiplayer battles with up to 16 people with friends, family or players from around the world. In “Adventure Mode”, you can enjoy the classic gameplay of monkey ball – roll the little monkey in the ball to reach the end within the time limit, and there are 200 new levels. In addition, this game also supports up to 4 people playing on one Switch at the same time, and you can also enjoy the exciting stories of new characters.
Advertisement (Please continue reading this article)
Story introduction While traveling on the southern island (Juice Island), Ai Ai and his party met a girl named Paret who was looking for the legendary banana. So, Aai and his friends embarked on a journey with Paret to the seven wonders of the island to collect Opaz, the key to finding the legendary banana. During the journey, they will encounter mysterious enemies and many secrets will gradually be revealed.
Advertisement (Please continue reading this article)
“Adventure Mode” World 1 ~ 5 Partial Level Introduction “Adventure Mode” will provide 200 challenging and charming new levels. In addition, when using a Switch console to play this game, up to 4 people can play in split screen mode (up to 4 people can also play at the same time in online mode). Whether you want to enjoy it alone or with family and friends, you can fully experience the fun of playing this game.
World 1 “Banana Farm – Spin Jump -“ This level is set up with terrain and jumping platforms that are higher than the ball. When moving forward, remember to make good use of the new action “Spin Dash” to fly over the height difference.
World 2 “Rose Garden-Fantasy Maze-“ The structure of this level is like a maze, remember to find the correct route in it.
World 3 “Piao Piao City – Switch and Advance -“ This level has a switch that moves the pedal. Remember to switch the switch at the appropriate time.
World 4 “Golden Shining Temple – Rolling Ball -“ This level has balls (boulders) that block the way, and players need to roll the boulders to move forward.
World 5 “Rocky Valley – Rocket Launcher -“ The end point of this level is set high in the sky, and players need to use a mechanism that can shoot vertically upward to fly to the end point.
